bibl.title: Greek Lyric. III. Stesichorus, Ibycus, Simonides, and Others.
bibl.seg: CAMPBELL David A. (Edited and Translated by), Greek Lyric. III. Stesichorus, Ibycus, Simonides, and Others. (The Loeb Classical Library. 476.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 1991, 8°, [viii]-652 pp. $15.50/£10.50.

C.R. par Dominique Arnould, RPhil 3e s., 67 (1993) p. 126. - Daniel Donnet, AntCl 62 (1993) p. 266. - Douglas E. Gerber, Phoenix 47 (1993) pp. 158-159. - Michael W. Haslam, CJ 89 (1994) pp. 310-311. - Hélène Perdicoyianni, EtCl 60 (1992) p. 280. - S.R. Slings, Mnemosyne 4a s., 47 (1994) pp. 104-109. - Martin L. West, CR N.S., 42 (1992) pp. 253-255. - François Jouan, REA 97 (1995) p. 649. - J.H. Molyneux, EMC 37 (1993) pp. 490-493.
